name: True Reflex
description:
True Reflex is a fast paced, 2 person, local multiplayer game that challenges your reflexes and is sure to get your heart pounding! Challenge your friends and dodge incoming balls to be the last one alive to claim victory!

Developers Statement:

True Reflex is a game I created entirely on my own (except for the music) over a span of about seven weeks. After playing games such as TowerFall Ascension, Super Hexagon, Lethal League, and many more, I wanted a create a game that captured the experiences I had in those games. If you do end up downloading this game, I hope you and your friends have similar experiences with True Reflex as the ones I had while creating this game.

- JKUO
